definition: an occasion for excessive eating or drinking, to overeat or eat immodestly
details:
noun
- an occasion for excessive eating or drinking
= synonyms: tear
- any act of immoderate indulgence
= synonyms: orgy, splurge
verb
- to overeat or eat immodestly
= example: to overeat or eat immodestly
= synonyms: satiate, stuff, glut, gorge, ingurgitate, overindulge, englut, engorge, overgorge, overeat, gormandize, gormandise, gourmandize, gourmandise, pig out, scarf out
